Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone!

I am, or should I say am not, the Ghost Works. I strive to make things ridiculously epic, and so incredibly awesome that they don't seem feasible, within Kerbal Space Program. I like to make things within the realm of possibility, and am DESPERATELY waiting for a multiplayer mod of some sort that works! Lastly I am excited to be here with a truly epic community who have all had the same us and downs as I.

Happy Launching!
Welcome! There is a mod which adds camera views of other players, which isn't bad. I think multiplayer could work as an experiment on Kerbin only, to avoid time warping issues.

Thanks! That mod definitely sounds good, however its not quite the same as actually having a friend there! A way i thought of doing it is like a request system, one player asks and everyone needs to accept, it will also pause the game temporarily while everyone accepts/ declines so nothing gets screwed up!

You might want to look into the L.O.G. project. Dunno if it's finished yet (or even released), but it'll be interesting to see when it is.

Happy (star)trails!
